abstract: With a $2 million base salary, the 2011 pay package for Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, so far totals $9 million. Goldman has not yet disclosed the size of his cash bonus.
snippet: With a $2 million base salary, the 2011 pay package for Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, so far totals $9 million. Goldman has not yet disclosed the size of his cash bonus.
lead_paragraph: The Goldman Sachs stock price was not the only thing to take a beating at the firm last year. Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive, also had his pay decline.

headline.main: Goldman Gives Blankfein $7 Million Stock Award

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Susanne Craig
